messages.title: Putting Hendon First
messages.content: Dismore has a track record of action not just words, having helped thousands of local people with their problems and led campaigns to save local services threatened with closure.

messages.title: My Pledges to you
messages.content: I will fight for our NHS, rebuild confidence in the police and take proper care of older people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for our NHS and tackle the GP crisis.
Rebuild confidence in the police and restore proper community policing.
Ensure the elderly care system is properly funded and integrated with our NHS.
Tackle the housing crisis with thousands of affordable homes.
Support the London Living Wage for all and end the outsourcing of our public services.

mentions.candidate: Dismore has a track record of action not just words, having helped thousands of local people with their problems and led campaigns to save local services threatened with closure.
mentions.tacticalSituation: This is a two horse race - it's between Andrew Dismore and the Tories.

issues.economy: Support the London Living Wage for all and end the outsourcing of our public services.
issues.health: Fight for our NHS and tackle the GP crisis. Ensure the elderly care system is properly funded and integrated with our NHS.

housing.content: Tackle the housing crisis with thousands of affordable homes.
